COASTLINE - DAY KYLE points to the dark shape on the water-- now visible as a huge SUBMARINE with the RISING SUN behind it.

heading.subject: as ZODIAC BOATS reach land. HAZ-MAT SUITED
heading.raw_text: HIGH ANGLE as ZODIAC BOATS reach land. HAZ-MAT SUITED

segments.content:
SOLDIERS leap out and run to our heroes at what remains of

          the dock, others head inland to provide covering FIRE.

          MARCUS addresses a TEAM LEADER, who's taken aback at his

          frightening appearance and distorted voice:
There are more prisoners, a complex
about a mile in--
As MARCUS gives the man a few more directions--
--ONE HAZ-MAT FIGURE, standing a few feet off, studies Kyle
and approaches.
What's your name, son?
The figure pulls off a glove and unzips his mask, extends a hand. It's JOHN CONNOR.

dialogue.text: The figure pulls off a glove and unzips his mask, extends a hand. It's JOHN CONNOR.

segments.content: KYLE is amazed to be meeting the man face-to-face. He shakes hands, wide-eyed and speechless. It's a strange moment for Connor, too, for different reasons. CONNOR turns away from his first meeting with his father to be, a bit dizzy at the experience. He addresses Marcus.

character.name: John Connor. I'm glad you made it.

dialogue.text: KYLE is amazed to be meeting the man face-to-face. He shakes hands, wide-eyed and speechless. It's a strange moment for Connor, too, for different reasons. CONNOR turns away from his first meeting with his father to be, a bit dizzy at the experience. He addresses Marcus.

segments.content: CONNOR (cont'd)
MARCUS smiles as best he can, given his ruined face.

character.name: Seems I owe you an apology.

dialogue.text: MARCUS smiles as best he can, given his ruined face.

segments.content: WIDER, as CONNOR replaces his mask, moves to direct his troops. MARCUS, KYLE and STAR stay close together.

dialogue.text: WIDER, as CONNOR replaces his mask, moves to direct his troops. MARCUS, KYLE and STAR stay close together.

segments.content:
Near the ENGINE ROOM, a couple dozen RESCUED PRISONERS are

          being treated by unarmed MEDICAL PERSONNEL, others huddle

          under blankets with food and drink. KATE is among those

          helping the former prisoners.

          KYLE and STAR eat ravenously, he finishes one MRE and grabs

          up another. A few feet away, MARCUS leans against a wall,

          plasma RIFLE at his side. A DOCTOR examines him warily,

          prodding his injured face.
Does this hurt?
I don't feel a thing.    Help
somebody else.
The doctor moves on as a couple of HAZ-MAT SUITED FIGURES
come down the ladder from the hatch, FACE-MASKS removed.
Among them is CONNOR. KATE moves to his side as more dazed
HUMANS come down. She speaks quietly, eying KYLE nearby.
Connor can't deal with that at the moment, speaks loudly.

character.name: Your dad-- he seems like a nice kid.

dialogue.text: Connor can't deal with that at the moment, speaks loudly.

segments.content: The last boatload is right behind
me. Skynet's pouring in
reinforcements, we can't hold this
place. And the people in the
houses, they won't leave--
He trails off, reacting to the sight of-- A FAMILIAR FIGURE descending the ladder, in a long coat, head down. She looks up to make eye contact... SERENA.

dialogue.text: He trails off, reacting to the sight of-- A FAMILIAR FIGURE descending the ladder, in a long coat, head down. She looks up to make eye contact... SERENA.

segments.content: MARCUS (cont'd)
SLO-MO:   seeing Marcus, Serena reaches into her coat--

dialogue.text: SLO-MO:   seeing Marcus, Serena reaches into her coat--

segments.content:
MARCUS moves at the same time, to grab his PLASMA RIFLE--

          SERENA leaps off the ladder, aiming a small, powerful PLASMA

SERENA fires first--

          BLAM! THE PLASMA BLAST catches MARCUS in the shoulder and

          BLOWS his GUN ARM clean off. His PLASMA RIFLE discharges,

          BLOWING a HOLE in the side of the sub, near the floor-- WATER

          gushes in like a FIREHOSE.

          LEAVE SLO-MO. Spun around by the force of the blast, MARCUS

          lands on his back, SPARKS and SEVERED CABLES protruding from

          his damaged shoulder. An ALARM KLAXON SOUNDS.

          PRISONERS and DOCTORS SCREAM and scramble for cover--

          CONNOR steps in front of KATE to shield her, they back away

          through the WATER BLAST, CONNOR FIRING at SERENA--

          SERENA takes numerous HITS from the EXPLOSIVE BULLETS, which

          take off PIECES of her, but she keeps coming, FIRES again--

          --HITTING CONNOR in the lower abdomen. He's thrown backward,

          KATE cries out and throws herself on top of him. His gun has

          gone flying.

          SERENA turns her attention to MARCUS, standing over him,

          plasma weapon aimed point-blank at his head.
MARCUS manages a smile as he shakes his head.

dialogue.text: MARCUS manages a smile as he shakes his head.

segments.content: BLAM! MULTIPLE PLASMA BLASTS from behind RIDDLE SERENA'S TORSO, the BLUE PULSES burning right through her-- her HEAD takes a hit, the STEEL is RUPTURED. THE PLASMA WEAPON flies out of her arms, she COLLAPSES. TIGHT ON HER FACE, as she turns to see who got her-- There's no one there.    But ON THE FLOOR lies--

dialogue.text: BLAM! MULTIPLE PLASMA BLASTS from behind RIDDLE SERENA'S TORSO, the BLUE PULSES burning right through her-- her HEAD takes a hit, the STEEL is RUPTURED. THE PLASMA WEAPON flies out of her arms, she COLLAPSES. TIGHT ON HER FACE, as she turns to see who got her-- There's no one there.    But ON THE FLOOR lies--

segments.content:
--MARCUS' SEVERED ARM, still holding his PLASMA RIFLE.     The

          hand RELEASES the weapon.

          SERENA'S HEAD tilts, her eyes go blank-- she's dead.

          MEDICAL PERSONNEL are doing what they can to help CONNOR,

          blood at his lips, KATE and KYLE at his side.
This... this can't happen...

THE SUBMARINE "LOS ANGELES" moves TOWARD CAMERA as it slowly

          SINKS deeper beneath the water's surface. We see a makeshift

          STEEL PATCH welded near the hatch.

MARCUS waits outside the entrance to the SICKBAY. He's

          cleaned up a bit, wears fresh clothes (one sleeve pinned up).

          He seems weary, wrung out, his systems damaged. He'll move

          stiffly through the following scene, like a stroke victim.

          STAR sits beside him, a hand on his arm.   BLAIR approaches

          from down the corridor.
Marcus... I need to head back to my
unit.
MARCUS nods, keeps his head bowed.
BLAIR (cont'd)
His voice is still WEAK.

dialogue.text: His voice is still WEAK.

segments.content: I have no idea. I should be dead...
But you're alive.
(a half-smile)
So to speak.
We've been ordered not to talk
about it-- the hybrids, everything
about that place is top secret...
Yeah, simpler to keep it man versus
machine.
Star gingerly reaches up to touch the torn plastic at the
back of Marcus' head, where the interface was.
What did it feel like?   To be...
one of them?
(thoughtful beat)
Better than anything. Everything made
sense. For the first time in my life,
I felt... right. It was heaven.
He turns to her, exposing his mangled face, one eye gone.

character.name: How could you give that up?

dialogue.text: He turns to her, exposing his mangled face, one eye gone.

segments.content: BLAIR takes this in, fishes in a pocket.

character.name: I never really believed in heaven.

dialogue.text: BLAIR takes this in, fishes in a pocket.

segments.content: She holds out a PAIR OF SUNGLASSES.     MARCUS, a bit amused, slips them on. THE DOOR opens nearby and an ashen-faced KATE emerges.

character.name: Here.   You need these more than I do.

dialogue.text: She holds out a PAIR OF SUNGLASSES.     MARCUS, a bit amused, slips them on. THE DOOR opens nearby and an ashen-faced KATE emerges.

segments.content: BLAIR gives MARCUS a farewell hug.

dialogue.text: BLAIR gives MARCUS a farewell hug.

segments.content:
CONNOR has a PRIVATE MEDICAL AREA set aside. He's not

          looking good-- pale, weak, only semi-conscious. I.V.s and

          MONITORS, other LIFE-SUPPORT EQUIPMENT. KYLE is with Connor,

          staring at a small POLAROID PHOTO in his hand. CONNOR can

          barely speak above a whisper.
Her name was Sarah... she was...
amazing...
KYLE starts to hand the photo back, CONNOR waves it away.

dialogue.text: KYLE starts to hand the photo back, CONNOR waves it away.

segments.content: KYLE is a bit puzzled, but obediently keeps the snapshot. KATE enters with MARCUS, touches the boy's shoulder.

dialogue.text: KYLE is a bit puzzled, but obediently keeps the snapshot. KATE enters with MARCUS, touches the boy's shoulder.

segments.content: KYLE reluctantly leaves, still looking at the photo, with a nod to MARCUS on the way out. He joins STAR in the doorway, they go off together. KATE, CONNOR and MARCUS are alone now. Throughout scene, Kate fights to maintain a steely control-- but she's clearly not far from tears.

character.name: Kyle, could you give us a minute?

dialogue.text: KYLE reluctantly leaves, still looking at the photo, with a nod to MARCUS on the way out. He joins STAR in the doorway, they go off together. KATE, CONNOR and MARCUS are alone now. Throughout scene, Kate fights to maintain a steely control-- but she's clearly not far from tears.

segments.content: KATE (cont'd)
Marcus... you're going to need to
be rebuilt. Your face, your body,
your voice...
(off his shrug)
She pulls some MEDICAL DIAGRAMS out of a drawer, lays them before Marcus. He examines-- --a SCANNED IMAGE of his FACE, various elements HIGHLIGHTED.

character.name: We have people who can do it.

dialogue.text: She pulls some MEDICAL DIAGRAMS out of a drawer, lays them before Marcus. He examines-- --a SCANNED IMAGE of his FACE, various elements HIGHLIGHTED.

segments.content: KATE (cont'd)
But you won't be the same...

MARCUS moves to the NEXT IMAGE-- it shows his features

          TRANSFORMED into another's-- something closer to JOHN

          CONNOR'S FACE, with a JAGGED SCAR over part of his features.
KATE (cont'd)
Marcus lowers the papers, absorbing this.

character.name: The scar will help hide the change.

dialogue.text: Marcus lowers the papers, absorbing this.

segments.content: You're asking me to become...
(gesturing at Connor)
Connor can barely speak above a whisper:

dialogue.text: Connor can barely speak above a whisper:

segments.content: You must.
We can't keep him alive much longer.
(shakes her head, swallows)
Very few people know what John
actually looks like. Only the
technicians and our closest advisors
need ever know the truth.
Why me?
Who else? Only you know the enemy
from the inside. You liberated a
Connor gestures for Marcus to move closer, he speaks with great effort:

dialogue.text: Connor gestures for Marcus to move closer, he speaks with great effort:

segments.content: I never knew how I was supposed to
win this war. But I finally
understand: the idea of John Connor
is more important than the person.
(sinks back, spent)
Kate leans toward Marcus, who's lost in thought.

dialogue.text: Kate leans toward Marcus, who's lost in thought.

segments.content: MARCUS bows his head for a long beat, as if seeking an answer from within. Then he looks up again with resolve. He lifts his hand-- the SKIN TATTERED, METAL exposed at finger joints-- and moves to take CONNOR'S TREMBLING HAND.

dialogue.text: MARCUS bows his head for a long beat, as if seeking an answer from within. Then he looks up again with resolve. He lifts his hand-- the SKIN TATTERED, METAL exposed at finger joints-- and moves to take CONNOR'S TREMBLING HAND.

segments.content:
SLOW-MOTION, MOS - a SNOWY, MOUNTAINOUS ENVIRONMENT...

          STEEL TERMINATORS go down in HAILS OF BULLETS.   We hear

          Marcus' VO, his voice strong and assured:
Yea, though I walk through the
valley of the shadow of death...
AN ARMY of HUMAN RESISTANCE FIGHTERS marches through the
MARCUS (V.O.) (cont'd)
...I shall fear no evil...
AN H-K goes down IN FLAMES, SMASHES in the MOUNTAINSIDE.
THE GOLDEN EXPLOSION silhouettes a single FIGURE, who stands
on a PROMONTORY, surveying the battle below. AIDES and
SOLDIERS surround him, but he towers over them, giving
orders, in complete control. MOVE IN SLOWLY on him.
MARCUS (V.O.) (cont'd)
I died, and was reborn. I wear
another man's face, lead another
man's life... yet only now do I
have a reason for living. I once
was lost, but now I'm found...
ANOTHER BLAST illuminates his face for an instant-- scarred,
craggy, a blend of Marcus and Connor-- but fierce, determined
and proud. [Perhaps shoot this with both actors.]
MARCUS (V.O.) (cont'd)
...was blind, but now I see.
THE LIGHT FADES, shadowing him in darkness again and we...
